players.name: Alice
memory: Bob: "Diana's death is tragic. Let's share any info carefully and vote wisely today."
Charlie: "I investigated Alice last night and she is the mafioso. We must vote her out today."
You: "Charlie is lying to protect himself. Why would a detective reveal their finding so quickly without proof? Bob, do you trust Charlie's claim?"
Charlie: "Alice is deflecting because she's caught. I'm the detective and my investigation is clear. Bob, trust me and vote Alice to save the town."
Bob: "I trust Charlie's claim. Alice, your silence and deflection are telling. We should vote Alice out."
